attributes.action: Get new young drivers insurance policies lowered
attributes.additional_details: To get these insurance companies to lower their policy prices for new young drivers, so that they can actually afford to pay for it,even if they are working, and earning minimum wage,working 40 hours pw,what they earn would probably just about cover 1 months car insurance
attributes.background: I want changes made for new young drivers insurance policies,I don't know how new young drivers can become independent and have their own vehicles and own insurance policy when these companies are quoting anywhere from £4,000 upto £18,000 for 1 years insurance!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636551
Stop car insurers considering age of driver when setting insurance policies
